author: leggat
body: Adding in a bug fix (summary maps crashed when expected MEs didn't exist) and removing an unnecessary file to bring PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17880 (91X, previously merged) in line with the 90X backport (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18035) that is still pending.
title: Bug fixes to co-ordinate 90X and 91X pixel phase 1 summary maps
